title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fast and compliant CI/CD pipelines in the financial industry (IND217)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 金融行业中快速且合规的 CI/CD 管道 (IND217)
abstract: With digital transformations, cloud migrations, and evolving regulations, financial institutions must deliver faster, manage increasing complexity, and stay compliant. Octopus Deploy helps organizations streamline delivery, secure deployments, and embrace innovation without compromising compliance. In this lightning talk, you’ll see how Octopus enables powerful pipelines that accelerate development and automate repeatable workflows across hybrid and multi-cloud environments. Built-in governance provides auditability, security, and role-based access controls tailored for regulated industries. Learn how financial services teams use Octopus Deploy to move quickly while keeping compliance front and center. This presentation is brought to you by Octopus Deploy, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 随着数字化转型、云迁移和不断变化的法规，金融机构必须更快地交付、管理日益增长的复杂性并保持合规。Octopus Deploy 帮助组织简化交付、确保部署安全，并在不影响合规性的前提下拥抱创新。在这个闪电演讲中，您将了解 Octopus 如何实现强大的管道，加速开发并在混合和多云环境中自动化可重复的工作流程。内置治理提供可审计性、安全性和为受监管行业量身定制的基于角色的访问控制。了解金融服务团队如何使用 Octopus Deploy 快速行动，同时将合规性放在首位。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Octopus Deploy 为您呈现。
